name: Iron Bank Lending Compound Strategy
description: Supplies {{token}} on [Compound](https://app.compound.finance/) and opens a long-term debt for an additional amount of {{token}} from [Iron Bank](https://docs.cream.finance/iron-bank/iron-bank) without the need for collateral, to maximize COMP earnings. Earned COMP is harvested and sold for more {{token}} and re-deposited into the vault.
